DOC.brief_summary: This study clinical trial design ass whether fish oil treatment effective prevention obesity-related fat tissue ( adipose ) inflammation . Specifically address hypothesis fish oil treatment reduce signal chemokine pathway ( fractalkine MCP-1 ) important adipose tissue recruitment activation certain white blood cell ( macrophage ) . The study double-blind placebo-controlled trial fish oil Lovaza GlaxoSmithKline ( omega-3-acid ethyl ester ; combination ethyl ester eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) ) obese non-diabetic adult , determine Lovaza decrease marker inflammation macrophage activation adipose blood understand mechanism fish oil affect inflammation .

Recent ( within 6 month ) use fish oil supplement self report dietary intake > 3 serving fish/month 5 . Blood pressure > 140/90 6 . Recent ( within 6 month ) use statin , niacin , fenofibrates 7 . Current plan pregnancy/lactation . Premenopausal woman unwilling prevent pregnancy use follow approve contraceptive strategy : diaphragm , cervical cap , condom spermicide , surgical sterility , birth control pill , DepoProvera injection , Intrauterine device , progestin implant , abstinence . 8 . Women unwilling limit alcohol consumption < 7 alcoholic drink per week < 3 alcoholic drink per occasion participate study . 11 . Hemoglobin le 11.0 g/dL 12 .
